name: The Selenian Sleepy
description:
The Selenian Sleepy A puzzle-platformer about descending a small Moon Wikipedia rabbit hole as you struggle to fall asleep. Contrary to popular belief, there are no secrets in this game. There is at least one secret.

Music by Mustafa Abbasi.

Sound effects from freesound.org by Cemala, Yuval, El-Boss.

Some public domain Images from Wikimedia Commons.

Controls:

  • A and D to move
  • S, or A and D simultaneously to sleep
  • Escape to open settings and remap controls

Don't use Chrome, or download the runnables to get better performance.
